# portkey_prompt (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a Portkey prompt.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `slug` (String) The slug of the prompt to look up.

### Optional

- `version` (String) Version to retrieve: 'latest', 'default', or a specific version number. Defaults to 'default'.

### Read-Only

- `collection_id` (String) Collection ID the prompt belongs to.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt was created.
- `id` (String) Prompt identifier (UUID).
- `model` (String) Model used for this prompt.
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the prompt.
- `parameters` (String) JSON string of model parameters.
- `prompt_version` (Number) Version number of the prompt.
- `prompt_version_id` (String) Version ID of the prompt.
- `prompt_version_status` (String) Status of the version (active, archived).
- `status` (String) Status of the prompt (active, archived).
- `template` (String) Prompt template string.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt was last updated.
- `virtual_key` (String) Virtual key (provider) slug used for this prompt.
